message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $12,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $12,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go below $11,000. This product is truly top-of-the-line and will bring you a lot of value.

Alice, I really appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  However, I'm still stuck at my budget of $8,000.  If you're willing to come down to that, I'll buy it right now. Otherwise, I'll have to go with John's offer.
